gapdata <- read.table("output/combined_gapMinder.tsv", sep = "\t", header = TRUE )  

Germanydata <- subset(gapdata, country == "Germany")

plot (
      y = Germanydata$gdpPercap,
      x = Germanydata$year,
      xlab = "Year",
      ylab = "GDP per capita",
      main = "GDP change for Germany"
      )
